title:
Hello team,
When trying to create an org in staging I'm getting an error, is this expected?
content:
=== Earlier conversation (context, already processed) ===
[2025-12-03T12:36:31.132Z] Panagiotis: Hello team,
When trying to create an org in staging I'm getting an error, is this expected?
[2025-12-03T14:28:13.772Z] Jordan Maduro: yeah this is still happening
[2025-12-03T14:46:01.273Z] Jordan Maduro: Cant see the issue do see a drop in database connections a couple of hours ago
[2025-12-03T16:08:45.705Z] Chandler: looks like this is back up and rolling!
[2025-12-03T20:00:24.786Z] Panagiotis: Just tried to setup an account in staging and I'm still getting the same error. Is there a known workaround?

```⚠️ Database connection unavailable```
:thinking_face:
[2025-12-03T20:01:08.716Z] Chandler: interesting — looking now

=== New messages since last pass (process these) ===
[2025-12-03T20:01:54.207Z] Chandler: very odd, I just successfully created a new tenant :thinking_face:
